note:
I (ab)use computers.

26 yo (or more if I forgor to update this :-D)

Sysadmin, selfhoster. Anime and hiking enjoyer, a bit of a language nerd.

Agender, aromantic, ace-spec. Not out irl to everyone.

Living somewhere in Czechia.

Pronouns: it/any (I'll probably use it/its for myself regardless of what you use); you/your for second person :-P

Maybe don't take me too seriously :-D And don't nerd-snipe me too often :-)

If it's not hard it's not fun. Even well-planned activities tend to leave room for improvisation.

Let's be friends! Follow requests undergo a quick vibe check, whether the account is a human. Bots and company accts don't try to follow/scrape me pls, won't accept anyway and it bothers me.

And now robot-readably: #nobot (If the robot is sad, I might make an exception :-D)

name: Languages
value: cs, C, en, Python, Elixir, de, whatever-language-broken-software-is-written-in, Kotlin (in order of familiarity)
